about_the_game:
Tales of the Elements - 2nd Chapter continues the story of the Hip Hop artist Last BeNeVoLeNcE and his team who are on a quest to rid their world of "The Industry" and the "Darkness." This chapter not only closes the story of Tales of the Elements but it also adds in new playable characters to the current cast and new locations--adding up to 8+ more hours of gameplay to the main story!

This also includes extras such as:

- 8 Additional Special Stages
- More secret bosses
- End-game "Gigs" (side-quests)
- More equipment and skills
- Dialogue that changes depending on the way you play

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU w/ 1GB Video RAM minimum
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Runs at 640x480 (Press "Alt+Enter" for fullscreen)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 or higher
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU w/ 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Runs at 640x480 (Press "Alt+Enter" for fullscreen)
